transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Shree Chakrapani Environmental Consultant company se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji, ma'am.
Customer: Yes sir, good morning. Main Riya bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Executive: Good morning, boliye.
Customer: Ji sir, actually mujhe aapko ye batana tha ki aapki ne aapne apni do categories promote kara rakhi hai sir. Water testing services and pollution control consultancy. To jo pollution control consultancy hai, sir wo category jo hai aapki deboost ho rahi hai kyunki uski leads, uski inquiries pe aap revert nahi kar rahe hain. To kuch aisa issue aa raha hai kya aapko like usage mein ya is category mein something?
Customer: Wo actually category mein jo leads aa rahi hai na ma'am, wo leads as per the requirement ke hisab se nahi hai. Validated leads nahi aa rahi hai wo.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm. To aapki requirement pe nahi hai matlab product jo hai wo aapki requirement mein nahi hai, location nahi hai, quantity nahi hai, convert nahi ho rahi hai. Kya issue hai sir?
Customer: Jo leads aati hai na, wo normally kaisa hai ki relevant nahi rehti hai. Most of the for example agar water testing ka hai to phir wo water testing pe abhi ye hai normally hamare humne abhi select karne ke time mein Maharashtra hi select kiya hua hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Kyunki wo water testing ke liye other state mein wo possible nahi hai wo sample collect karna, lekin karna.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To humne jo selected kiye hue hai usme se bhi jo aate hai wo relevant nahi rehte hai. Kuch specific requirements rehti hai agar wo quantity wise ek quantity rahega testing ke liye to uska jo transportation aur charges hai aur wahi usme wo hisab se nahi rehta hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: To last time ek meeting bhi arrange hamari jo team hai unhone kuch baat kiya tha aapki team se. To humne kuch from this meeting mein kuch discussions part of aaya tha. Basically hamara specially wo pura security jo hai to uske upar karke wo dikhta hai.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul. Haan haan haan.
Customer: Hmm. To jo bhi hai unhone last time discuss kiya tha ki aap listing kijiye consume karne se aapko lead jyada aayegi.
Executive: Aayegi. Bilkul.
Customer: To haan to abhi wo ek baar main check kar leta hu. Uske liye specially humne employee bhi already humne hire kiye hue hai.
Executive: Hmm. Hmm hmm. Basically IndiaMART ke liye actually dekhne ke liye magar wo jis tarah se hona chahiye leads consume us tarah se nahi ho pa raha hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir dekhiye main aapko yaha pe ye batati hu ki buyleads to thik hai maine waha pe do teen cheeze batayi thi ki jo buyleads likhi hai wo consume karni hai plus jo past lead hai jo lead sold out ho gayi hai unko I am interested mark karna hai uske alawa hume ji hume lead manager pe jaake wo dono apni specific category ko search karna hai us pe agar hume koi purani inquiry bhi hai to bhi hume unhe reply karna hai at least teen se char so that again wo hamara system usko recapture kare aur dobara se uski inquiry aapko aaye. To jaise ye water testing services ki to aap thoda bahut use karte hain lekin pollution control consultancy mein aapne sirf do product add kiye hain ek to pollution control consultancy aur dusra field monitoring services. But field monitoring services aapne out of stock mark kar rakha hai to kya ek hi product ya jo dusra hai wo bhi out of stock hai kaise isme kya karna hai sir?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Isme kya hai field monitoring matlab kya hai ki air monitoring chahiye matlab usme jaise abhi single hum log dal nahi sakte ki ambient air monitoring kyunki usme air air mein alag alag type hai ambient bhi hai stack bhi hai noise bhi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur jo bhi hai to kya hai ki humne wo field monitoring consider karke chala tha agar wo field monitoring mein kya hai ki us tarah ka lead koi usko ye nahi karta hai koi bhi company jo hai usko field monitoring mein consider nahi karti hai. To basically hume air monitoring aisa kuch something dalna padega jisse ki wo lead koi jinki requirement hai wo usko search kar sake.
Executive: Bilkul wahi main aapko bol rahi hu ki pollution control consultancy ke jo bhi alternative names hain ya kuch bhi iski aisi sub name hai jo market mein aur search hote hain to hume wo bhi with the same category add karna hoga. Jaise agar main aapka yaha pe abhi bata deti hu ye jo hamara consultancy wala product hai sir aapko yaha pe just a second ye pollution control consultancy to pollution control consultancy mein jo hai abhi last month jo hai wo saat se aath total inquiry aayi thi IndiaMART pe thik hai uske pehle 12 aayi thi 13 to ek to aapka product line hi limited hai thik hai to uske
Customer: Ji bilkul.
Executive: Ji bilkul to uska demand bhi limited hai to sir supply bhi utni hogi matlab agar all over market mein uske limited number of buyers hai offline bhi to online bhi limited hi honge to usme hume thoda sa jyada check karna padega aur October mein se still wo saat inquiry mein se do inquiry aapke paas last month aayi thi thik hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: To ji jitna hai matlab demand jitna hai utna aapko us kuch percentage mein mil raha hai uske alawa bhi jo hamare higher listing ke services wale hain wo bhi unko bhi leads aati hai wo bhi sell karta hai highly active jo rehte hai aapko bhi dikhta hoga past lead mein sara data right?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To hume us tarike se hi iska usage karna padega sir.
Customer: Aap samajh rahe hain?
Executive: Yes ma'am, yes I understand.
Executive: To aap mujhe ye batayiye na sir ye lead kaise consume hogi matlab pollution control consultancy ka aapka jo category hai wo jo deboost ho raha hai uske regarding abhi bola tha maine aapko inquiry consume ki thi aapne purani inquiry pe revert kiya tha?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir kitna aapne kya hai wo basically last time maine bataya na aapko ki mujhe bhi unse baat karna padega unhone kya usme kya kiya hai. Jaise aapne bataya us tarah se unhone kuch follow kiya hai ki nahi kiya hai. I think so mujhe lagta hai ki unhone baat bhi kiya tha ki hum log kuch meeting karenge uska bhi kya hua ek baar wo dekhna padega.
Executive: Ji. Haan. Aap bilkul main aapko batati hu mere paas bhi sara data noted rehta hai sir meri jo baat hui thi wo aapse hui thi 27th ko jo aapki team se hui thi October. Humne sari cheeze ki thi. Sir unhone mujhe bola ma'am aap mujhe Thursday call karega yani 30th October. Thik hai to maine waha pe unko do bari call bhi kiya hai 30th ko but maybe he was busy unhone call nahi receive kiya haan sir uske baad maine aapko call nahi kiya uske baad maine aapko 3 tarikh ko call kiya hai. Unhone 30 ko bola 30 ko call nahi answer hua to 31st ko main bhi busy thi maine nahi call kiya ek do chutti thi Saturday Sunday tha 3 ko maine again call kiya hai aapke end se answer nahi hua hai phir uske baad maine aaj call kiya hai sir.
Customer: Okay okay. Haan.
Executive: To ek baar aap unse baat karke mujhe revert kar dijiye kyunki aapki promoted category sir deboost nahi honi chahiye warna iska koi sense nahi banega.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai? Hmm. Okay sir, okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's pollution control consultancy category deboosted.

- Leads are not relevant to the customer.

- Field monitoring services marked as out of stock.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to consume buyleads.

- Executive suggested adding alternative names for consultancy.

- Executive shared inquiry data for the past months.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with team and revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, pollution control, air monitoring
